Document.TEXT: Oppenheimer Reiterates Buy Rating for Sensata Technologies Holding (ST) Posted by Hasmir Abdula on Feb 8th, 2016 // No Comments Sensata Technologies Holding (NYSE:ST) ‘s stock had its buy rating reiterated by Oppenheimer in a report released on Thursday, MarketBeat reports. They presently have a $45.00 price target on the stock, down from their prior price target of $56.00. Oppenheimer's price objective would indicate a potential upside of 40.49% from the company's previous close. In other Sensata Technologies Holding news, SVP Martin J. Carter sold 66,000 shares of the business's stock in a transaction on Tuesday, November 17th. The shares were sold at an average price of $43.87, for a total transaction of $2,895,420.00. Following the transaction, the senior vice president now owns 38,080 shares in the company, valued at $1,670,569.60. The transaction was disclosed in a document filed with the Securities & Exchange Commission, which is available at this hyperlink . ST has been the topic of several other research reports. Zacks Investment Research raised shares of Sensata Technologies Holding from a sell rating to a hold rating in a report on Monday, October 12th. Citigroup Inc. downgraded shares of Sensata Technologies Holding from a buy rating to a neutral rating in a report on Wednesday, October 7th. Stifel Nicolaus lowered their target price on shares of Sensata Technologies Holding from $54.00 to $50.00 and set a buy rating on the stock in a report on Monday, January 11th. RBC Capital lowered their target price on shares of Sensata Technologies Holding from $50.00 to $45.00 and set a sector perform rating on the stock in a report on Friday, January 15th. Finally, Wells Fargo downgraded shares of Sensata Technologies Holding from an outperform rating to a market perform rating and set a $37.03 target price on the stock. in a report on Thursday, January 21st. Nine research analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating and seven have issued a buy rating to the company. The company presently has an average rating of Hold and a consensus target price of $48.00. Sensata Technologies Holding ( NYSE:ST ) traded down 4.08% during trading on Thursday, hitting $32.00. 1,011,525 shares of the company traded hands. The company's 50 day moving average is $39.64 and its 200-day moving average is $44.97. The stock has a market capitalization of $5.45 billion and a PE ratio of 15.76. Sensata Technologies Holding has a 52 week low of $31.60 and a 52 week high of $55.53. Sensata Technologies Holding (NYSE:ST) last issued its quarterly earnings results on Tuesday, February 2nd. The company reported $0.66 earnings per share for the quarter, beating the consensus estimate of $0.65 by $0.01. The firm had revenue of $726.50 million for the quarter, compared to analysts' expectations of $722.45 million. During the same period in the prior year, the firm earned $0.57 EPS. Sensata Technologies Holding's revenue for the quarter was up 3.0% compared to the same quarter last year. Analysts predict that Sensata Technologies Holding will post $2.85 earnings per share for the current year. A number of hedge funds and institutional investors have recently bought and sold shares of the stock. Harvey Investment Co. LLC boosted its position in Sensata Technologies Holding by 10.5% in the fourth quarter. Harvey Investment Co. LLC now owns 396,095 shares of the company's stock worth $18,244,000 after buying an additional 37,650 shares during the period. Cantillon Capital Management LLC boosted its position in Sensata Technologies Holding by 0.5% in the fourth quarter. Cantillon Capital Management LLC now owns 5,997,486 shares of the company's stock worth $276,244,000 after buying an additional 27,984 shares during the period. Korea Investment CORP boosted its position in Sensata Technologies Holding by 21.9% in the fourth quarter. Korea Investment CORP now owns 550,553 shares of the company's stock worth $25,358,000 after buying an additional 98,900 shares during the period. State Board of Administration of Florida Retirement System purchased a new position in Sensata Technologies Holding during the fourth quarter worth $282,000. Finally, Scout Investments Inc. boosted its position in Sensata Technologies Holding by 16.8% in the fourth quarter. Scout Investments Inc. now owns 6,816 shares of the company's stock worth $314,000 after buying an additional 980 shares during the period. Sensata Technologies Holding N.V. is a global industrial technology company. The Company is engaged in the development, manufacture and sale of sensors and controls. The Company's operating segments include Sensors segment and Controls segment. The Company produce sensors and controls for applications such as thermal circuit breakers in aircraft, pressure sensors in automotive systems, and bimetal current and temperature control devices in electric motors. document.write(‘ ‘); Receive News & Ratings for Sensata Technologies Holding Daily - Enter your email address below to receive a concise daily summary of the latest news and analysts' ratings for Sensata Technologies Holding and related companies with MarketBeat.com's FREE daily email newsletter . « Previous Shutterfly, Inc.
